mapper.select: select ID as id, Power_name as powerName, Power_w as powerQx from tower_power;

select a.ID as id, a.Admin_id as adminid, a.Admin_name as adminname, a.Admin_power as adminpower, p.Power_name as adminpowerName, a.Admin_area as adminarea, a.Admin_Area_city as adminareacity, a.Admin_wxid as wxid, u.Wx_name as wxname, u.User_tele as wxphone, CONVERT(varchar, a.Admin_add_time, 120 ) as adddate from tower_admin a left join tower_user_info u on u.Wx_id = a.Admin_wxid left join tower_power p on a.Admin_power = p.ID where a.ID = #{ID}

select id as id, Power_name as powername, Power_w as powerw from tower_power where 1=1
and id in (3,4,6,7)
and id in(3,4,5)
and id in(3,5)
and id=4
and id=5
and id=6

select * from (select *,ROW_NUMBER() OVER (ORDER BY addtime desc) as rank from( select u.Wx_id as wxid, u.User_name as username, u.Wx_name as wxname, u.User_tele as usertele, t.Type_name as usertype, r.area_name as areaname, c.City_name as cityname, CONVERT(varchar, u.Add_time, 120 ) as addtime from tower_user_info u left join tower_user_type t on t.ID=u.User_type left join tower_area r on r.ID=u.User_area left join tower_city c on c.City_id=r.City_id where 1=1 and u.Wx_id not in(select Admin_wxid from tower_admin where Admin_is_bind=1)
and u.User_tele like '%${usertele}%'
and u.User_name like '%${username}%'
)w1)as tmp where tmp.rank between #{pageno}*10-9 and #{pageno}*10

select count(1)
from tower_user_info u left join tower_user_type t on t.ID=u.User_type left join tower_area r on r.ID=u.User_area left join tower_city c on c.City_id=r.City_id where 1=1 and u.Wx_id not in(select Admin_wxid from tower_admin where Admin_is_bind=1)
and u.User_tele like '%${usertele}%'
and u.User_name like '%${username}%'

select s.Admin_wxid as adminwxid, s.Admin_power as adminpower from tower_admin s where 1=1 and s.Admin_is_bind=1 and s.Admin_power in (2,3) and ((select COUNT(1) from tower_admin where CHARINDEX(',${area},',','+s.Admin_area+',')>0)>0 or s.Admin_Area_city=#{city} ) ;
